RR_verdict: The Adidas Supernova Rise 2 makes some smart tweaks without taking any steps backward. We found a lighter build, a noticeably improved upper, a smooth-and-flexible midsole, and zero compromises in comfort or durability—all while keeping the same price as last year. There’s nothing overly bold or exaggerated in this shoe, and in our view, that’s part of its charm.
